services.main_title: WE OFFER A WIDE RANGE OF SERVICES
services.description: Trakindo offers a wide range of services, technical inspections, maintenance and repair programs to suit the different needs of our customers. These include the Parts Exchange Service, Planned Component Replacement Service, Custom Track Service, Custom Hydraulic Service and Field Service programs.

cards.title: Easy Access to Information on More Than One Million Parts
Take Your Inspections Digital Cut Out The Paperwork With Cat® Inspect
Connecting to Your Asset With a Comprehensive Overview.

commitment.title: Committed to Indonesia's Advancement, 50 Years and Counting
commitment.description: Since its establishment in 1970, Trakindo has taken a pivotal role in assisting Indonesia's growth and development. Supported by state-of-the-art facilities and advanced technology, competent experts from a variety of industries, and a class leading network of branches across Indonesia, Trakindo is ready to advance its customers in their journeys.

testimonials.name: Ersan Ersan
testimonials.quote: "Rental machine unit is still in good quality and performance around 90% because its well-maintained by Trakindo. We expect that Trakindo consistently maintains its high service quality standard, and I would.."

testimonials.name: Budi Santoso
testimonials.quote: "The after-sales support from Trakindo is outstanding. Whenever there's an issue, their team responds quickly and effectively, minimizing downtime on our site."

testimonials.name: Citra Lestari
testimonials.quote: "The Bundling Solution program has been a great help in managing our maintenance budget. The quality of genuine CAT parts is unquestionable."

testimonials.name: Dewi Anggraini
testimonials.company: Head of Logistics PT Tambang Sejahtera
testimonials.quote: "With Cat® Inspect, our daily inspection process has become much more efficient and accurate. All data is well-documented and easily accessible."

testimonials.name: Agus Wijaya
testimonials.quote: "The reliability of CAT heavy equipment is key to the success of our projects. Trakindo not only sells products but also provides comprehensive solutions."
